definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Right thermocouples, heat resistance , is a very good tool.
sentences.chinese: 对热电偶，热电阻的计算，是一个很好的工具软件。

sentences.english: The calibration of thermocouples plays a very important part in its using process.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶的检定是其使用过程中必不可少的工作环节。

sentences.english: Reference Channel. On a thermocouple scanner card, the channel that measures the temperature of the isothermal block.
sentences.chinese: 参考通道在热电偶扫描卡上，测量等温块温度的通道。

sentences.english: For current measurements, the customers use thermoelements connected in parallel with precision shunts .
sentences.chinese: 对于电流测量来说，客户使用热电偶并联精密分压器。

sentences.english: Try checking the die exit temperature with a surface thermocouple.
sentences.chinese: 要设法用表面热电偶检查口模出口温度。

sentences.english: The use of other types of thermocouple elements require approval by SECCO.
sentences.chinese: 其它类型的热电偶元件的使用要得到赛科的批准。

sentences.english: K-type thermocouple, contactless switch relay, limit unit.
sentences.chinese: 型热电偶，非接触型继电器开关，极限装置。

sentences.english: Is the thermocouple positive and negative poles are consistent.
sentences.chinese: 是热电偶的正负极是否一致。

sentences.english: Temperature responses in the grinding zone were measured using a pair of constantan-iron foils.
sentences.chinese: 并采用夹丝热电偶法实际测量了磨削弧区温度。

sentences.english: Reference junction compensation is required for thermocouple measurement with voltmeters.
sentences.chinese: 参考交界补偿所需的热电偶测量电压表。

sentences.english: It could be resistivity, if you have a thermocouple.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有个热电偶，它也可以是电阻率。

sentences.english: The transmitter is wired for up-scale thermocouple burn-out protection .
sentences.chinese: 变送器上壳连有热电偶烧毁保护接线。

sentences.english: Thermocouple hole into the outlet, outlet and a good location Hough mouth.
sentences.chinese: 把热电偶孔进风口，出风口和哈夫口定位好。

sentences.english: Thermocouples may be routed through the flexible conduit to the outlet box.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶可能会通过一条柔软的导线管通到接线盒。

sentences.english: Temperatures recorded at points on a luminaire shall be measured by means of thermocouples.
sentences.chinese: 灯具上各点的温度应当运用热电偶的方式来测得。

sentences.english: Sitting in a warm room reduces the power available from thermocouples.
sentences.chinese: 处于温暖的房间中会减少热电偶产生的可用能量。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
